title: "Carta Healthcare Becomes Certified Software Vendor For AFib Ablation Registry"
excerpt: "Carta Healthcare, a company that provides artificial intelligence (AI)-powered clinical data abstraction technology and services, has announced it will be a certified software vendor for ACC's AFib Ablation Registry."
